pages.index: Design Muse - Innovative Interior Design About us Numbers Order Gallery Privacy Terms Modern design studio Any design solution for your apartment Sign up Crafting Spaces, Shaping Dreams At Design Muse, our philosophy is rooted in the belief that design transcends mere aesthetics. It is about creating spaces that resonate with the essence of who you are and what you aspire to be. With a blend of innovation, artistry, and meticulous attention to detail, our team of dedicated designers brings your vision to life. From contemporary urban apartments to serene country homes, each project is a journey towards a space that reflects your unique identity. Embracing Innovation & Sustainability Founded on the principles of creativity, sustainability, and unparalleled service, Design Muse stands as a beacon of excellence in the world of interior design. Our portfolio showcases a wide range of styles, each telling the story of our clients' dreams translated into reality. By embracing the latest trends and technologies, we ensure that every design is not only timeless but also environmentally conscious. Join us in the art of transforming spaces into experiences that inspire and uplift. By the Numbers 3,000+ Satisfied Clients 500+ Innovative Projects 100+ Awards Won 20 Years of Experience Unleashing Creativity, Crafting Elegance At Design Muse, we believe in the power of design to transform ordinary spaces into extraordinary experiences. Our team of passionate designers and innovators work tirelessly to create environments that not only look stunning but also function beautifully. From the initial concept to the final touches, we ensure every detail is perfected to meet our high standards and your unique needs. Whether you’re looking to renovate your home, revamp your office, or bring a new project to life, we’re here to make your vision a reality. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Design Muse About us Numbers Order Gallery Privacy Terms Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy outlines our commitment to protecting the privacy of our users. It details how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information and informs you about your rights under privacy legislation. Understanding and Definitions Understanding The terms defined herein shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they are in the singular or plural. Definitions Account: A unique account established for you to access our service or specific parts of it. Affiliate: An entity that is under the control of, controls, or is under common control with our company, where "control" is defined as owning at least 50% of the voting shares, shares, or other securities eligible for the election of directors or other managerial authority. Company: Refers to Design Muse. Device: Any device capable of accessing the service, such as a smartphone, computer, or digital tablet. Personal Data: Any data about an individual from which that person can be identified from those data (or from those and other information either in our possession or likely to come into our possession). Service: The website operated by Design Muse. Service Provider: Any individual or company that processes data on behalf of Design Muse. This includes third-party companies or individuals contracted by the company to facilitate the service, provide the service on behalf of the company, perform services related to the service, or assist the company in analyzing how the service is used. Usage Data: Data collected automatically, generated by the use of the service or from the service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit). You: The person accessing or using the service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such person is accessing or using the service, as applicable. Protection of Children's Privacy Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If You are a parent or guardian and You are aware that Your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers. If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: Por e-mail: designmuse@gmail.com Contacts +91-136-1963961 designmuse@gmail.com Address 313, Vijan Market, Chowk, near Karamchand, Ganjipura, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh 482002, India Schedule Daily from 09:00 to 18:00
pages.terms: Terms of Use - Design Muse About us Numbers Order Gallery Privacy Terms Terms and Conditions We urge you to read these terms and conditions carefully before engaging with our services. Clarifications and Definitions Clarifications The capitalized terms used herein are defined under certain conditions and shall maintain their assigned meanings, whether used in the singular or plural. Definitions Affiliate: Refers to any entity exercising control over, controlled by, or commonly controlled with a party, where "control" encompasses owning 50% or more of the voting rights, equity, or other securities influencing management election. Company: This term refers to HeadlightsShiny, the entity behind the service. Device: Encompasses any mechanism allowing access to the service, including but not limited to computers, smartphones, and tablets. Service: This term is used in reference to the website provided by the Company. You: Identifies any individual or entity using or accessing the service, personally or on behalf of another legal entity. Acknowledgment These terms and conditions form the basis of the agreement between you and the company, outlining the legal rights and obligations of all parties regarding the use of the service. Your use of the service is conditioned upon your acceptance and adherence to these terms. They are applicable to all users, visitors, and others accessing or utilizing the service. By engaging with the service, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you find any part of these terms unacceptable, it is advised not to use the service. You affirm that you are at least 18 years of age. The company explicitly prohibits the use of the service by individuals under 18 years of age. Your use of the service is also conditioned upon your acceptance of the company's privacy policy, which should be carefully reviewed before engagement. External Links Our service may feature links to websites or services not operated by us. These links are provided for convenience and do not signify endorsement. We are not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. It is your responsibility to review the privacy policies and terms of any websites you visit. Termination of Service We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any breach of these terms. If your right to use the service is terminated, it will cease immediately. Limitations of Liability In no event shall the company or its suppliers be liable for any incidental, indirect, special, punitive, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the service, regardless of whether such damages are foreseeable. The aggregate liability of the company and its suppliers under these terms is limited to the greater of the amount you paid to the company for access and use of the service, or 100 USD if no purchase was made through the service. Provision of Service "AS IS" The service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis, with no warranties of any kind, expressed or implied. The company disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. The company does not warrant that the service will operate uninterrupted, be secure, or be available at any particular time or location. Applicable Law The laws of the country, excluding conflict of laws rules, govern these terms and your use of the service. Your use of the app may also subject you to other local, state, national, or international laws. Dispute Resolution If you have disputes or concerns regarding the service, we encourage you to contact the company directly to seek resolution. Severability & Waiver Severability If any provision of these terms is deemed unlawful or unenforceable, such provision shall be modified to achieve the original intent as closely as possible, and the remaining provisions shall remain in effect. Waiver Failure to enforce any right or provision of these terms shall not be considered a waiver of those rights. Modification of Terms We reserve the right to modify these terms at our discretion. You will be notified of any significant changes in advance, and by continuing to use the service, you accept the revised terms. Contact Us If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us directly.
